src.helpers package¶

Submodules¶

src.helpers.database module¶

exception src.helpers.database.KeyViolation¶

Bases: Exception

src.helpers.database.populate() → None¶

Sets up test database, and adds testing server as an entry

src.helpers.database.single_SQL(query: str, values: tuple[str, ...] = None) → list[tuple[any, ...]]¶

Opens a connection, submits a single SQL query to the database then cleans up

Parameters:

  • query (string) – SQL query to execute

  • values (tuple, optional) – Values to provide to the SQL query (i.e. for %s). Defaults to None.

Raises:

KeyViolation – Raised when key constraint is violated

Returns:

Values returned from sql query as a list of tuples.

Return type:

(list)

class src.helpers.style.Emotes¶

Bases: object

Emotes for Nix. Emotes should appear at the end of messages or lines, not before or within. Try to use Emotes in all Nix messages and try to use all emotes equally.
